findings.message: OpenAddressLottery.forceReseed().s (open_address_lottery.sol#91) is a storage variable never initialized
findings.name: uninitialized-storage

findings.message:
OpenAddressLottery.participate() (open_address_lottery.sol#46-65) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- luckyNumberOfAddress(msg.sender) == LuckyNumber (open_address_lottery.sol#53)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
OpenAddressLottery.participate() (open_address_lottery.sol#46-65) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- luckyNumberOfAddress(msg.sender) == LuckyNumber (open_address_lottery.sol#53)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
OpenAddressLottery.participate() (open_address_lottery.sol#46-65) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(winner[msg.sender] == false) (open_address_lottery.sol#51)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected s.component2 = uint256(block.blockhash(block.number - 1)) (open_address_lottery.sol#93):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.19 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.19 (open_address_lottery.sol#6)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: Variable OpenAddressLottery.LuckyNumber (open_address_lottery.sol#37) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message:
Reentrancy in OpenAddressLottery.participate() (open_address_lottery.sol#46-65):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(win) (open_address_lottery.sol#60)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (open_address_lottery.sol#64)
		- lastReseed = block.number (open_address_lottery.sol#79)
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (open_address_lottery.sol#64)
		- secretSeed = uint256(keccak256()(components.component1,components.component2,components.component3,components.component4)) (open_address_lottery.sol#73-78)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas
